name: lei-ns
description: Organizing your code without writing wired variable constructs and helper objects
author: Zongmin Lei <leizongmin@gmail.com> (http://ucdok.com)

scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -t 5000 -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
